.fill {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}

.backface-hidden {
    -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
    -moz-backface-visibility: hidden;
    backface-visibility: hidden;
}

.rotate (@deg) {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(@deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(@deg);
    -ms-transform: rotate(@deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(@deg);
    transform: rotate(@deg);
}

.border-radii (@topright: 0, @bottomright: 0, @bottomleft: 0, @topleft: 0) {
    -webkit-border-top-right-radius: @topright;
    -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: @bottomright;
    -webkit-border-bottom-left-radius: @bottomleft;
    -webkit-border-top-left-radius: @topleft;
    -moz-border-radius-topright: @topright;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomright: @bottomright;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomleft: @bottomleft;
    -moz-border-radius-topleft: @topleft;
    border-top-right-radius: @topright;
    border-bottom-right-radius: @bottomright;
    border-bottom-left-radius: @bottomleft;
    border-top-left-radius: @topleft;
}

.hCenter (@width) {
    @halved: (@width / 2);

    width: @width*(1px);
    margin-left: @halved*(-1px);
    left: 50%;
    position: absolute;
}

.vCenter (@height) {
    @halved: (@height / 2);

    height: @height*(1px);
    margin-top: @halved*(-1px);
    top: 50%;
    position: absolute;
}

.centered {
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    position: absolute;
}

.origin (@origin) {
    -ms-transform-origin: percentage(@origin);
    -webkit-transform-origin: percentage(@origin);
    -moz-transform-origin: percentage(@origin);
    -o-transform-origin: percentage(@origin);
    transform-origin: percentage(@origin);
}

.transform (@transform) {
    -webkit-transform: @transform;
    -moz-transform: @transform;
    -ms-transform: @transform;
    -o-transform: @transform;
    transform: @transform;
}

.transition (@transform) {
    -webkit-transition: @transform;
    -moz-transition: @transform;
    -ms-transition: @transform;
    -o-transition: @transform;
    transition: @transform;
}

.no-select {
    -webkit-touch-callout: none;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -khtml-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none;
}

@font-face {
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-family: 'geosanslightregular';
    src: url('../../fonts/geosanslight-webfont.eot');
    src: url('../../fonts/geosanslight-webfont.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), url('../../fonts/geosanslight-webfont.woff2') format('woff2'), url('../../fonts/geosanslight-webfont.woff') format('woff'), url('../../fonts/geosanslight-webfont.ttf') format('truetype'), url('../../fonts/geosanslight-webfont.svg#geosanslightregular') format('svg');
}

@font-face {
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-family: 'FontAwesome';
    src: url('../../fonts/fontawesome-webfont.eot?v=4.2.0');
    src: url('../../fonts/fontawesome-webfont.eot?#iefix&v=4.2.0') format('embedded-opentype'), url('../../fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff?v=4.2.0') format('woff'), url('../../fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf?v=4.2.0') format('truetype'), url('../../fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svg?v=4.2.0#fontawesomeregular') format('svg');
}

/*@media
only screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2),
only screen and (   min--moz-device-pixel-ratio: 2),
only screen and (     -o-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2/1),
only screen and (        min-device-pixel-ratio: 2),
only screen and (                min-resolution: 192dpi),
only screen and (                min-resolution: 2dppx) { 
    Retina-specific stuff here
}*/

* {
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    image-rendering: -moz-crisp-edges;
    image-rendering: -o-crisp-edges;
    image-rendering: crisp-edges;
    image-rendering: -webkit-optimize-contrast;
    -ms-interpolation-mode: nearest-neighbor;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialiased;
}

html {
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: #0E0318;
    font-size: 17px;
    min-height: 400px;
    min-width: 280px;
    .no-select;
}

body {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: url("../../img/htmlbg.png") no-repeat center center;
    margin: 0;
    opacity: 0;

    &.loaded {
        .transition(opacity .15s ease-in-out);
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

html, body, form {
    .fill;
}

svg {
    display: none;
}

span, a {
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

#contactInfo {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    font-family: geosanslightregular;
    color: #fff;
    margin-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 10px;
    z-index: 1;
    font-size: 2rem;

    > h1 {
        font-size: 1.75em;
        margin-top: 0;
        padding-bottom: 0;
        margin-bottom: 0;
        line-height: 1em;
        font-weight: 400;
    }

    > h3 {
        letter-spacing: 1.5px;
        font-size: 0.6em;
        margin-top: 0;
        margin-bottom: 0;
        font-weight: 400;
    }

    > a {
        float: left;
        display: inline-block;
        margin-right: 1.15em;
        font-size: .55em;
        width: 1.5em;
        text-align: center;
        line-height: 1.5em;
    }
}

#infoPanel {
    display: none;
    position: relative;
    color: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    height: auto;
    min-height: 150px;
    z-index: 4;
    font-family: 'geosanslightregular';
    .hCenter(600);
    padding: 10px;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0, rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 5%, rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 95%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0,rgba(0,0,0,0)), color-stop(5%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25)), color-stop(95%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25)), color-stop(100%,rgba(0,0,0,0))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 5%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 95%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 5%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 95%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 5%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 95%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* IE10+ */
    background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 5%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 95%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* W3C */
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#00000000', endColorstr='#00000000',GradientType=1 ); /* IE6-9 */
    > #infoPrev,
    > #infoNext {
        display: block;
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: 50px;
        opacity: .1;
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
    }

    > #infoPrev {
        left: 0;
        background: url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat center center;
        float: left;
    }

    > #infoNext {
        right: 0;
        background: url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat center center;
        float: right;
    }

    > div > #infoClose {
        cursor: pointer;
        float: right;
        margin-top: 2px;
        font-size: 25px;
        opacity: 0;
        display: block;
    }

    &:hover > #infoPrev,
    &:hover > #infoNext,
    &:hover > div > #infoClose {
        opacity: 0.5;
    }

    > #infoPrev:hover,
    > #infoNext:hover,
    > div > #infoClose:hover {
        opacity: 1;
    }

    ul {
        padding-left: 15px;
        float: right;
        margin-top: 4px;
        margin-bottom: 0;

        > li {
            list-style: none;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }
    }

    a {
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    > div {
        margin-left: 60px;
        margin-right: 60px;
    }

    h2 {
        margin: 0;
        font-size: 2em;
        font-weight: 400;
    }

    p {
        text-align: justify;
    }
}

#infoContent {
    .interestImage {
        a {
            border: 2px solid #fff;
            width: 100px;
            height: 31px;
            display: inline-block;
            opacity: 0.75;

            &:hover {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }

        img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
        }
    }

    p a {
        color: #B1BBF8;

        &:hover {
            color: #fff;
        }
    }

    &.sheri p a {
        color: #B1BBF8;
    }

    &.sheri p a:hover {
        color: #FF8FD4;
    }

    &.computers ul {
        width: 85px;
    }

    &.computers ul li {
        margin-left: 3px;
        float: left;
    }

    &.computers .interestImage a {
        width: 30px;
    }

    &.computers .interestImage ul {
        width: 70px;
    }
}

#topMarginContainer {
    position: absolute;
    -moz-transform: scale(1);
    -ms-transform: scale(1);
    -o-transform: scale(1);
    -webkit-transform: scale(1);
    transform: scale(1);
    .fill;
}

#contactThanks {
    font-family: geosanslightregular;
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    color: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    display: none;
    width: 310px;
    height: 27px;
    font-size: 20px;
    text-align: center;
}

#contactForm {
    font-family: geosanslightregular;
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    color: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    padding-top: 1%;
    display: none;

    > span {
        color: #fff;
        font-size: 30px;
    }

    > label {
        width: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
    }

    > input {
        background-color: #080808;
        border: 1px solid #252525;
        width: 95%;
        margin-bottom: 1%;
        color: #fff;
        font-family: 'geosanslightregular';
    }

    > textarea {
        background-color: #080808;
        border: 1px solid #252525;
        resize: none;
        width: 95%;
        height: 100px;
        color: #fff;
        font-family: 'geosanslightregular';
        padding: 1px 0 1px 0;
    }

    > input.unhappy,
    > textarea.unhappy {
        background-color: #400000;
        border-color: #A10000;
    }

    .unhappyMessage {
        color: #f00;
        font-size: 22px;
        font-family: arial;
        line-height: 20px;
        padding-left: 2px;
    }
}

.fa {
    display: inline-block;
    font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    font-size: inherit;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    opacity: 0.75;

    &:hover {
        opacity: 1;
        cursor: pointer;
    }
}

.fa-rocket {
    float: right;
    margin-top: 10px;
    margin-right: 20px;
    color: #414141;

    &:before {
        content: "\f135";
    }
}

.fa-file-pdf-o {
    font-size: 1rem !important;

    &:before {
        content: "\f1c1";
    }
}

.fa-file-word-o {
    font-size: 1rem !important;

    &:before {
        content: "\f1c2";
    }
}

.fa-close:before {
    content: "\f00d";
}

.fa-at:before {
    content: "\f1fa";
}

.fa-comment:before {
    content: "\f075";
}

.fa-linkedin:before {
    content: "\f0e1";
}

.fa-github-alt:before {
    content: "\f113";
}

#debugCol {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 1;
    overflow: hidden;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 200px;
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
}


@import "variables";

#theHeavens {
    .backface-hidden;
    .transform(translateZ(0));
}

#theHeavens,
#theStars {
    position: absolute;
    overflow: hidden;
    .fill;
}

#theStars {
    z-index: 0;

    > i {
        position: absolute;
        width: 4px;
        height: 4px;
        z-index: 0;
        .border-radii(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);

        &:before,
        &:after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            z-index: -1;
            display: block;
            opacity: 0;
            .transition(opacity 0.35s ease-in-out);
        }

        &:before {
            width: 4px;
            height: 100px;
            top: 50%;
            .transform(translateY(-50%));
            background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0, rgba(69,104,240,1) 48%, rgba(70,104,242,0) 49%, rgba(244,59,39,0) 51%, rgba(242,62,43,1) 52%, rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
            background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0,rgba(30,87,153,0)), color-stop(48%,rgba(69,104,240,1)), color-stop(49%,rgba(70,104,242,0)), color-stop(51%,rgba(244,59,39,0)), color-stop(52%,rgba(242,62,43,1)), color-stop(100%,rgba(125,185,232,0))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
            background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(69,104,240,1) 48%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 49%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 51%,rgba(242,62,43,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
            background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(69,104,240,1) 48%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 49%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 51%,rgba(242,62,43,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
            background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(69,104,240,1) 48%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 49%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 51%,rgba(242,62,43,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* IE10+ */
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(69,104,240,1) 48%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 49%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 51%,rgba(242,62,43,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* W3C */
            filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#001e5799', endColorstr='#007db9e8',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
        }
        /*F43B27, 4668F2*/
        &:after {
            width: 50px;
            height: 4px;
            left: 50%;
            .transform(translateX(-50%));
            background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0, rgba(240,60,41,1) 48%, rgba(244,59,39,0) 49%, rgba(70,104,242,0) 51%, rgba(71,106,242,1) 52%, rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
            background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0,rgba(30,87,153,0)), color-stop(48%,rgba(240,60,41,1)), color-stop(49%,rgba(244,59,39,0)), color-stop(51%,rgba(70,104,242,0)), color-stop(52%,rgba(71,106,242,1)), color-stop(100%,rgba(125,185,232,0))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
            background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(240,60,41,1) 48%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 49%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 51%,rgba(71,106,242,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
            background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(240,60,41,1) 48%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 49%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 51%,rgba(71,106,242,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
            background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(240,60,41,1) 48%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 49%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 51%,rgba(71,106,242,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* IE10+ */
            background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(30,87,153,0) 0,rgba(240,60,41,1) 48%,rgba(244,59,39,0) 49%,rgba(70,104,242,0) 51%,rgba(71,106,242,1) 52%,rgba(125,185,232,0) 100%); /* W3C */
            filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#001e5799', endColorstr='#007db9e8',GradientType=1 ); /* IE6-9 */
        }

        &.shimmer:before,
        &.shimmer:after {
            opacity: 0.5;
        }
    }
}

.sprite {
    .backface-hidden;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-image: url("../../img/spritesheet.png");
    background-size: 422px 250px;
    text-indent: -99999px;
    overflow: hidden;
    display: block;
}

#meteor {
    height: 2px;
    width: 400px;
    z-index: 100;
    position: absolute;
    opacity: 0;
    .rotate(-35deg);
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 0, rgba(30,234,234,1) 3%, rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 6%, rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0,rgba(255,255,255,0.25)), color-stop(3%,rgba(30,234,234,1)), color-stop(6%,rgba(255,255,255,0.25)), color-stop(100%,rgba(255,255,255,0)));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 0,rgba(30,234,234,1) 3%,rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 6%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 0,rgba(30,234,234,1) 3%,rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 6%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 0,rgba(30,234,234,1) 3%,rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 6%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 0,rgba(30,234,234,1) 3%,rgba(255,255,255,0.25) 6%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#40ffffff', endColorstr='#00ffffff',GradientType=1 );
}


#moon, #lowEarthOrbit, #earthShadow {
    pointer-events: none;
}

#planetEarth {
    .backface-hidden;
    background-image: url("../../img/earthSprite.png");
    .hCenter(390);
    .vCenter(390);

    &.dark {
        background-position: 390px 0;
    }

    > a {
        margin: 0 auto;
        position: absolute;
        display: block;
        cursor: pointer;
        -webkit-filter: brightness(0.85);

        &:hover {
            -webkit-filter: brightness(1);
        }
    }
}

#moon {
    .hCenter(900);
    .vCenter(900);

    > .sprite {
        width: 104px;
        height: 104px;
        content: '';
        display: block;
        background-position: -104px -146px;
    }

    &.dark {
        > .sprite {
            background-position: 0 -146px;
        }
    }
}

#spaceShuttle {
    position: absolute;
    left: 65px;
    height: 44px;
    width: 94px;
    background-position: -246px 0;
    .rotate(-30deg);

    &.dark {
        background-position: -152px 0;
    }
}

#satellite {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    height: 52px;
    width: 82px;
    background-image: url(data:image/gif;base64,);
    background-size: 82px 52px;
    .rotate(140deg);

    &.dark {
        background-image: url("../../img/spritesheet.png") !important;
        background-size: 422px 250px;
        background-position: -340px 0;
    }
}

#lowEarthOrbit {
    .hCenter(600);
    .vCenter(600);
}

#ash {
    z-index: 1;
    .transform(translate(0,0));
    cursor: pointer;
    height: 76px;
    width: 34px;
    margin-top: -257px;
    margin-left: -17px;
    position: absolute;
    overflow: visible;
    .centered;

    > #status {
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
        width: 42px;
        height: 42px;
        top: -42px;
        right: -27px;
        background-image: url(data:image/gif;base64,);
        background-size: 42px 42px;
        .rotate(8deg);
    }

    &.walking {
        width: 38px;
        background-image: url("../../img/ash_walking.gif");
        background-size: 38px 76px;
    }

    &.standing {
        background-position: -274px -62px;
    }

    &.standing-away {
        margin-left: -11px;
        .rotate(0);
        width: 30px;
        background-position: -308px -62px;
    }

    &.sitting-camp {
        margin-left: -26px;
        margin-top: -237px;
        .rotate(0);
        height: 58px;
        width: 36px;
        background-position: -370px -62px;
    }

    &.sitting-vidya {
        margin-left: -29px;
        margin-top: -235px;
        .rotate(0);
        height: 58px;
        width: 32px;
        background-position: -338px -62px;
    }

    &.dark {
        background-position: -240px -62px;
    }

    &.flipped {
        .transform(scaleX(-1));
        -ms-filter: "FlipH";
        filter: FlipH;
    }
}

#computers {
    width: 76px;
    height: 62px;
    bottom: -46px;
    left: 127px;
    background-position: -76px 0;
    .rotate(186deg);

    &.dark {
        background-position: 0 0;
    }
}

#nature {
    width: 176px;
    height: 98px;
    top: -24px;
    left: -23px;
    .rotate(-36deg);
    background-size: 176px 98px;
    background-image: url("../../img/mountain.gif");

    &.dark {
        background-image: url("../../img/spritesheet.png") !important;
        background-size: 422px 250px;
        background-position: -208px -146px;
    }
}

#games {
    width: 86px;
    height: 84px;
    top: -2px;
    right: 0;
    background-position: -86px -62px;
    .rotate(47deg);

    &.dark {
        background-position: 0 -62px;
    }
}

#sheri {
    width: 34px;
    height: 70px;
    top: 165px;
    right: -38px;
    background-position: -206px -62px;
    .rotate(90deg);

    &.dark {
        background-position: -172px -62px;
    }
}

#earthShadow {
    display: inline-block;
    top: 50%;
    right: 50%;
    position: absolute;
    height: 378px;
    margin-top: -189px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 97%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 99%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0,rgba(0,0,0,0.5)), color-stop(97%,rgba(0,0,0,0.5)), color-stop(99%,rgba(0,0,0,0)), color-stop(100%,rgba(0,0,0,0)));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 97%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 99%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 97%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 99%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 97%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 99%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 97%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 99%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#80000000', endColorstr='#00000000',GradientType=1 );
    .rotate(-35deg);
    .origin(1);
}

@media (max-height: 800px), (max-width: 600px) {
    html {
        font-size: 13px;
        /*min-height:700px;*/
    }

    body {
        background-position: center 750px;
        background-size: 1500px 1500px;
    }

    #lowEarthOrbit, #planetEarth, #ash, #moon, #satellite {
        bottom: 0;
        top: auto;
    }

    #planetEarth {
        margin-bottom: -300px;
    }

    #ash {
        margin-bottom: 75px;
    }

    #lowEarthOrbit {
        margin-bottom: -390px;
    }

    #moon {
        margin-bottom: -450px;
    }
}

@media (min-width: 600px) {
    html {
        /*min-height:700px;*/
    }

    body {
        background-size: 1500px 1500px;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 350px) {
    html {
        font-size: 11px;
    }

    body {
        background-size: 700px 700px;
    }

    #planetEarth {
        width: 195px;
        height: 195px;
        background-size: 195px 195px;
        margin-bottom: -115px;
        margin-left: -97px;
        bottom: 0;
        top: auto;
    }

    #lowEarthOrbit {
        width: 400px;
        height: 400px;
        margin-bottom: -200px;
        margin-left: -200px;
    }

    #moon {
        background-size: 50px 50px;
        width: 500px;
        height: 500px;
        margin-bottom: -250px;
        margin-left: -250px;
    }

    #spaceShuttle {
        position: absolute;
        left: 125px;
        height: 29px;
        width: 62px;
    }

    #satellite {
        height: 25px;
        width: 30px;
    }

    #ash {
        height: 38px;
        width: 17px;
        margin-left: -8px;
        margin-bottom: 73px;
        bottom: 0;
        top: auto;

        > #status {
            width: 21px;
            height: 21px;
            top: -21px;
            right: -13px;
        }

        &.walking {
            width: 19px;
        }

        &.standing-away {
            margin-left: -5px;
            width: 15px;
        }

        &.sitting-camp {
            margin-left: -13px;
            margin-top: -118px;
            height: 29px;
            width: 18px;
        }

        &.sitting-vidya {
            margin-left: -14px;
            margin-top: -117px;
            height: 29px;
            width: 16px;
        }
    }

    #computers {
        width: 38px;
        height: 31px;
        bottom: -23px;
        left: 63px;
    }

    #nature {
        width: 88px;
        height: 49px;
        top: -12px;
        left: -11px;
    }

    #games {
        width: 43px;
        height: 42px;
        top: -1px;
        right: 0;
    }

    #sheri {
        width: 17px;
        height: 35px;
        top: 82px;
        right: -19px;
    }
}
